name: Hoppy IPA
description: A bold India Pale Ale with citrus and pine notes, perfect for beer enthusiasts.

name: Golden Lager
description: Crisp and refreshing lager with a clean finish, great for any occasion.

name: Dark Stout
description: Rich and creamy stout with chocolate and coffee flavors.

name: Wheat Beer
description: Light and refreshing wheat beer with hints of banana and clove.

name: Amber Ale
description: Smooth amber ale with caramel malt flavors and a balanced hop profile.

name: Pale Ale
description: Classic pale ale with floral hop aromas and a crisp finish.

name: Porter
description: Robust porter with dark malt flavors and subtle chocolate notes.

name: Belgian Tripel
description: Strong Belgian-style tripel with fruity esters and spicy yeast character.

name: Craft Lager
description: Premium craft lager with clean malt character and subtle hop bitterness.

name: Session IPA
description: Lower ABV IPA that's easy to drink with bright citrus and tropical hop flavors.

name: Imperial Stout
description: High-gravity stout with intense roasted malt and dark fruit flavors.

name: Saison
description: Farmhouse ale with peppery yeast character and refreshing dryness.

name: Brown Ale
description: Nutty brown ale with caramel malt sweetness and subtle roast character.

name: Hefeweizen
description: Traditional German wheat beer with banana and clove aromas.

name: Barleywine
description: Aged English-style barleywine with rich malt complexity and warming alcohol.

name: Classic Martini
description: A sophisticated cocktail made with gin and dry vermouth, garnished with an olive or lemon twist.

name: Old Fashioned
description: A timeless whiskey cocktail with muddled sugar, bitters, and a splash of soda, garnished with an orange peel.

name: Mojito
description: A refreshing Cuban cocktail with white rum, fresh lime juice, sugar, soda water, and mint leaves.

name: Margarita
description: A classic tequila cocktail with lime juice, triple sec, and a salted rim.

name: Cosmopolitan
description: A stylish vodka cocktail with cranberry juice, lime juice, and triple sec.

name: Negroni
description: A bitter Italian cocktail made with gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth, garnished with an orange peel.

name: Whiskey Sour
description: A balanced whiskey cocktail with fresh lemon juice, simple syrup, and a cherry garnish.

name: Mai Tai
description: A tropical rum cocktail with lime juice, orgeat syrup, and curaçao, garnished with a pineapple and cherry.

name: Bloody Mary
description: A savory vodka cocktail with tomato juice, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, and classic garnishes.

name: French 75
description: An elegant champagne cocktail with gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup, topped with champagne.

name: Manhattan
description: A sophisticated whiskey cocktail with sweet vermouth and bitters, garnished with a cherry.

name: Piña Colada
description: A creamy tropical cocktail with rum, pineapple juice, and coconut cream, blended to perfection.

name: Espresso Martini
description: A modern vodka cocktail with coffee liqueur, espresso, and simple syrup for an energizing kick.

name: Tom Collins
description: A refreshing gin cocktail with lemon juice, simple syrup, and soda water, garnished with a lemon slice.

name: Singapore Sling
description: A complex gin cocktail with cherry brandy, pineapple juice, lime juice, and bitters.

name: Sidecar
description: A classic cognac cocktail with lemon juice and triple sec, with a sugared rim.

name: Moscow Mule
description: A spicy vodka cocktail with ginger beer and lime juice, served in a copper mug.

name: Irish Coffee
description: A warm whiskey cocktail with hot coffee, sugar, and whipped cream.

name: Aviation
description: A floral gin cocktail with maraschino liqueur, lemon juice, and crème de violette.

name: Dark 'n' Stormy
description: A bold rum cocktail with ginger beer and lime juice, perfect for stormy weather.

name: Tito's Handmade Vodka
description: Smooth, clean vodka distilled from corn with a slightly sweet finish.

name: Grey Goose Vodka
description: Premium French vodka with exceptional purity and a clean, crisp taste.

name: Absolut Vodka
description: Swedish vodka known for its purity and versatility in cocktails.

name: Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey
description: Iconic American whiskey with a smooth, charcoal-filtered character.

name: Jameson Irish Whiskey
description: Triple-distilled Irish whiskey with smooth, spicy notes and a clean finish.

name: Johnnie Walker Black Label
description: Premium Scotch whisky with rich, smoky flavors and hints of honey and spice.

name: Patrón Silver Tequila
description: Ultra-premium blanco tequila with bright agave flavors and a smooth finish.

name: Don Julio Blanco Tequila
description: High-quality blanco tequila with pure agave taste and citrus notes.

name: Clase Azul Reposado Tequila
description: Award-winning reposado tequila aged in oak barrels with vanilla and caramel notes.

name: Hendrick's Gin
description: Unique gin infused with cucumber and rose petals for a floral, refreshing profile.

name: Bombay Sapphire Gin
description: London dry gin with ten botanicals including almond, lemon peel, and grains of paradise.

description: Classic London dry gin with juniper-forward character and citrus notes.

description: Light, versatile white rum perfect for mixing in cocktails.

description: Popular spiced rum with notes of vanilla, cinnamon, and tropical fruits.

name: Mount Gay Eclipse Gold Rum
description: Barbadian gold rum with rich molasses flavors and a smooth, warming finish.
